scripts.install:all: bun run install:client:web_babylon_js && bun run install:client:web_three_js && bun run install:cli && bun run install:sdk
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean:client:web_babylon_js && bun run clean:client:web_three_js && bun run clean:cli && bun run clean:sdk
scripts.build:all: bun run build:server:api && bun run build:server:tick
scripts.dev:client:web_babylon_js: export VRCA_CLIENT_WEB_BABYLON_JS_DEBUG_SESSION_TOKEN=$(bun run server:postgres:system-token true) && cd ../client/web_babylon_js/volume/app && bun run dev
scripts.dev:client:web_three_js: export VRCA_CLIENT_WEB_THREE_JS_DEBUG_SESSION_TOKEN=$(bun run server:postgres:system-token true) && cd ../client/web_three_js/volume/app && bun run dev
scripts.test:server:db:unit: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_api_manager vircadia_world_tick_manager && bun test ./test/2_test_db_unit.ts && bun run server:run-command up vircadia_world_api_manager vircadia_world_tick_manager -d
scripts.server:init: bun run build:server:api && bun run build:server:tick && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_postgres -d && bun run server:postgres:health && bun run server:postgres:migrate && bun run server:postgres:seed:sql && bun run server:postgres:seed:assets && bun run server:postgres:seed:scripts && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_api_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_tick_manager -d && bun run server:run-command up --build vircadia_world_pgweb -d
scripts.server:rebuild-all: bun run server:run-command down -v && bun run server:init
scripts.server:postgres:reset: bun run server:run-command down vircadia_world_api_manager vircadia_world_tick_manager vircadia_world_pgweb && bun run server:postgres:wipe && bun run server:postgres:migrate && bun run server:postgres:seed:sql && bun run server:postgres:seed:assets && bun run server:postgres:seed:scripts && bun run server:run-command up -d
scripts.client:rebuild-all: bun run client:run-command down -v && bun run client:init
